DOC.brief_summary: This feasibility study evaluate 6-month obesity treatment intervention ( Helping HAND : Health Activity Nutrition Directions ) pediatric primary care clinic . The program target 5-8 year old child parent change child 's lifestyle behavior associate parent practice improve child 's weight status . Four community clinic participate . Families recruit clinic informed consent baseline data obtain , family randomize one two group : ( 1 ) treatment group immediately participate Helping HAND ( 2 ) wait list control group , start program 7 month later . Data gather participate child parent three time point : baseline , post intervention ( month 7 ) post wait list control group complete intervention ( month 14 ) . This pilot study test feasibility obesity prevention plus program deliver child 's primary care clinic . The primary outcome family attendance 3 data-collection meeting research staff 6 prevention plus intervention session train Health Advisor .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot RCT Obesity Intervention Primary Care Pediatrics : Helping HAND
